title: my account pw keeps getting changed on this account
body: i dont know how they are doing it. there are no loose ends that they can track to get my pw email pw and other stuff to change the passwords i need help. i know the people doing this and their IGN'S if someone wishes to speak to me directly please tell me i have discord and teamspeak.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to Riot, use an account recovery ticket and a fresh email to do so since you won't have to login and therefore they won't be able to see your tickets.

Support will help you to secure the account.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
ive already done this im waiting to see if it happens again after the 2 time
Hi there! I wanted to follow up with you to see if you were still having any issues with this. Let me know!
